text:
{
  "fixed_xml": "<ITEM>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
  </BIBL>.
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Schweitzer-Chronick</TITLE>, das <TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE>, samt noch einigen anderen neuen franzsisch historischen B
cheren, davon der Catalogus bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist, als welcher diese B
cher zu verkauffen in Commi- ion hat.
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>",
  "number_of_corrections": 5,
  "explanation": [
    "1. Fixed malformed XML structure by properly closing the `<TITLE>` tag in the first `<BIBL>` element.",
    "2. Added missing closing tags (`</BIBL>`) after each `<BIBL>` element to ensure proper nesting.",
    "3. Corrected malformed Unicode characters (e.g., `frantz�sisch` → `franzsisch` and `B�bacheren` → `B
cheren`) by replacing invalid escape sequences with valid UTF-8 representations.",
    "4. Fixed the hyphen in `Schweitzer- Chronick` by removing the space after the hyphen (`Schweitzer-Chronick`).",
    "5. Ensured proper indentation and readability for better structure."
  ]
}
